== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Escr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2130/index.htm U+02130].
  * `&escr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/212f/index.htm U+0212F].
